channel.title: CVE Feed for Progress -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Progress -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-5806|2024-06-27T13:22:54.244Z -- progress -- moveit%20transfer
item.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in Progress MOVEit Transfer (SFTP module) can lead to Authentication Bypass.This issue affects MOVEit Transfer: from 2023.0.0 before 2023.0.11, from 2023.1.0 before 2023.1.6, from 2024.0.0 before 2024.0.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-5806|2024-06-26T14:00:36.973Z -- progress -- moveit%20transfer
item.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in Progress MOVEit Transfer (SFTP module) can lead to Authentication Bypass.This issue affects MOVEit Transfer: from 2023.0.0 before 2023.0.11, from 2023.1.0 before 2023.1.6, from 2024.0.0 before 2024.0.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-1403|2024-02-27T15:39:54.850Z -- progress -- openedge
item.description: In OpenEdge Authentication Gateway and AdminServer prior to 11.7.19, 12.2.14, 12.8.1 on all platforms supported by the OpenEdge product, an authentication bypass vulnerability has been identified.Â The vulnerability is a bypass to authentication based on a failure to properly handle username and password. Certain unexpected content passed into the credentials can lead to unauthorized access without proper authentication.

item.title: CVE-2024-5805|2024-06-25T15:03:03.608Z -- progress -- moveit%20gateway
item.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in Progress MOVEit Gateway (SFTP modules) allows Authentication Bypass.This issue affects MOVEit Gateway: 2024.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-5806|2024-06-25T15:04:37.342Z -- progress -- moveit%20transfer
item.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in Progress MOVEit Transfer (SFTP module) can lead to Authentication Bypass in limited scenarios.This issue affects MOVEit Transfer: from 2023.0.0 before 2023.0.11, from 2023.1.0 before 2023.1.6, from 2024.0.0 before 2024.0.2.
